messages.messageBody:
***HAPPY*** 20th Shirley and dh ... and ... MANY *HAPPY* RETURNS :)

Pris ~> OOOooooooooooOOOOOOOOOOooooooooooOOOOOOOOOO (blowing happy thoughts
your way today) <G>
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...
